H3.text: what kind of painter was wassily kandinsky. Abstract art

A4.text: Kandinsky is generally credited as one of the pioneers of abstraction in Western art.

A5.text: Wassily Kandinsky's art has a confluence of music and spirituality. With his appreciation for music of his times and kinesthetic disposition, Kandinsky's artworks have a marked style of expressionism in his early years.

A6.text: Kandinsky's Introspective Path to Abstract Reality
